imdb.plot outline: Wataru and Nao, who have been together since middle school, are now a married couple expecting their first child. But before the birth of his son, Wataru dies of fatal sickness. Five years later, the boy, Ayumu, finds a letter from his father, written like a pirate challenge.
imdb.title: 5-nengo no raburetâ
plot: Wataru and Nao, who have been together since middle school, are now a married couple expecting their first child. But before the birth of his son, Wataru dies of fatal sickness. Five years later, the boy, Ayumu, finds a letter from his father, written like a pirate challenge.::http://mydramalist.info/title/10101/5_nen_go_no_love_letter
